cause.description:
Ok, This Week Has Fallen Apart For Me Since Day One And Hey, It Has Only Gotten Worse
I'm Up Shit Creek, If You Are Too, Join The Cause
1. Having A Bad Week
2. Virtually Nothing Makes You Smile
3. And You Want To Join The Others
cause.mission: Get All Those Who Feel Like Crap To Come Join Others Like Themselves
cause.name: Down With The Week From The Gates Of Hell
